competition_summary.context: Competition Parker operates in highly competitive markets and industries.  We offer our products over numerous, varied markets through our divisions operating in 43 countries.  Our global scope means that we have hundreds of competitors across our various markets and product offerings.  Our competitors include U.S. and non-U.S. companies.  These competitors and the degree of competition vary widely by product lines, end markets, geographic scope and/or geographic locations.  Although each of our
